mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St John the Baptist the following described and named slaves: John, american mulatoo boy, aged about 27 years, 5 feet 6 inches high, speak had english and little french; Georges, american negro boy aged about 30 years, 5 feet 9 inches high, left eye squinting. Said slaves giving themselves as property of M. L. D. Brewer of St Francisville. St John the Baptist, January 27th 1855. NUMA TREPAGNIER. Deputy Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
